Package de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.failurehandling

Beagle’s handling of exceptional situations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FailureResolver
    Interface for instances resolving failures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExceptionThrowingFailureResolver
    FailureResolver throwing an exception for any reported failure.
    FailureHandler
    Handler for any failures that may occur while running Beagle.
    FailureReport<RECOVER_TYPE>
    Information about a failure that occurred while running Beagle.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
